column4: the management of Thansur Sokha Hotel announced that the company is now facing serious difficulties in collecting garbage that stinks and sometimes weights up to several tons
column5: especially every weekend because  the company does not have enough staff to collect the garbage during the outbreak of COVID-19.------The company would like to apologize and ask for understanding from all national and international guests
column8: the company will start tightening environmental management as follows:------1. All national and international guests are not allowed to bring food on Bokor Mountain anymore.------2- It is not allowed to eat on the streets and public places on Bokor Mountain. ------KBN
